solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isIsomorphic(String s1, String s2) {--newline--        int[] m = new int[512];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < s1.length(); i++) {--newline--            if (m[s1.charAt(i)] != m[s2.charAt(i)+256]) return false;--newline--            m[s1.charAt(i)] = m[s2.charAt(i)+256] = i+1;--newline--        }--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}
